snippet.title: INFINITE AIR - GAMEPLAY TRAILER
snippet.description: Get to know the pro riders in Mark McMorris Infinite Air, the brand new snowboarding game from HB Studios and Maximum Games. With procedural mountain generation, 100+ square miles of open-world backcountry and real-world competitions, Infinite Air promises an authentic, hyper-realistic snowboarding experience! Preorder today for exclusive content: http://bit.ly/2bhew3k
